query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingTiers) as bedroom_tiers,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingSqm) as sqm_pricing,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingItems) as upholstery_items,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM addOns) as add_ons,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM addOnTiers) as add_on_tiers,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM packageDiscounts) as package_discounts,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM specialOffers) as special_offers

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2j9NYXgTnYir7Mh.root --database Htf64TWdaDvosPeCL5WWib --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingTiers) as bedroom_tiers,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingSqm) as sqm_pricing,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pricingItems) as upholstery_items,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM addOns) as add_ons,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM addOnTiers) as add_on_tiers,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM packageDiscounts) as package_discounts,
